text: I played this game a few months ago.  It's not one of my favorite RPGs, but it's still pretty fun.  This town theme is catchy, though.  It reminds me of something from Pokemon Ruby/Saphire, or Diamond/Pearl for some reason.

text: Quite liked this game. Playing the "end" at the start was a nice touch. I see Fortress of Doom is already up, the only other tracks from this game that sticks in my mind as memorable are the shop music and the music that plays in the odd shrine (and the Dragon Shrine too).
author: Babybahamut

text: One of the very few games I quit playing due to boredom.  Palate-swapped dungeons got old after a while.  The music, however, is quite enjoyable.
